mapper.insert: insert into app_license(d_no, license_no, license_photo, pho_filename, pho_type) values(#{d_no}, #{l_no}, #{licensePhoto}, #{phoFilename}, #{phoType})
mapper.select: select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_email, m.m_tel, h.hos_name, d.career, i.license_name, l.pho_filename, l.license_OX from app_doctor d left join app_hospital h on d.hos_no=h.hos_no left join app_license l on d.d_no=l.d_no left join app_license_info i on l.license_no=i.license_no left join app_member m on m.m_no=d.d_no order by d.d_no desc

select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_email, m.m_tel, h.hos_name, d.career, i.license_name, l.pho_filename, l.license_OX from app_doctor d left join app_hospital h on d.hos_no=h.hos_no left join app_license l on d.d_no=l.d_no left join app_license_info i on l.license_no=i.license_no left join app_member m on m.m_no=d.d_no where d.d_no=#{d_no}

select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_email, m.m_tel, h.hos_name, d.career, i.license_name, l.pho_filename, l.license_OX from app_doctor d left join app_hospital h on d.hos_no=h.hos_no left join app_license l on d.d_no=l.d_no left join app_license_info i on l.license_no=i.license_no left join app_member m on m.m_no=d.d_no where l.license_no=#{l_no}
